mapper.select: select id, admin_id, create_time, ip, address, user_agent from ums_admin_login_log where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ums_admin_login_log(admin_id, create_time, ip, address, user_agent) values (#{adminId}, #{createTime}, #{ip}, #{address}, #{userAgent})

insert into ums_admin_login_log(admin_id, create_time, ip, address, user_agent) values
(#{entity.adminId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.userAgent})

insert into ums_admin_login_log(admin_id, create_time, ip, address, user_agent) values
(#{entity.adminId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.userAgent})
on duplicate key update admin_id = values(admin_id), create_time = values(create_time), ip = values(ip), address = values(address), user_agent = values(user_agent)
mapper.update:
update ums_admin_login_log
admin_id = #{adminId},
create_time = #{createTime},
ip = #{ip},
address = #{address},
user_agent = #{userAgent},
where id = #{id}
